attributes.additional_details: After years of cuts our NHS and police forces are in crisis our streets are no longer safe with 2 few police, many low paid workers are living in poverty and relying on food banks and shambolic universal credit top ups. Public sector workers have had minimal payrises over the last few years .. businesses don't give pay rises when they are not running well parliament should be the same .... it's about time our voice was heard
attributes.background: Stop MPs payrise until vital services are out of crisis

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for MPs' pay. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: https://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/
